com.yy.transvod.player

接口 OnPlayerStateUpdateListener


  • public interface OnPlayerStateUpdateListener
    Interface definition of a callback when the player engine state update.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int PLAYER_STATE_ENDED
      The playing task is finished.
      static int PLAYER_STATE_IDLE
      The player engine is idle.
      static int PLAYER_STATE_INVALID
      The player engine has been released.
      static int PLAYER_STATE_LOADING
      The player engine is buffering data for to play.
      static int PLAYER_STATE_PAUSED
      The player engine has been paused.
      static int PLAYER_STATE_PLAYING
      The player engine is playing.
      static int PLAYER_STATE_READY
      The player engine is ready.
      static int PLAYER_STATE_UNKNOW
      Unknow.
      static int PLAYREASON_ANCHOR_NETWORK_BAD 
      static int PLAYREASON_AUDIENCE_NETWORK_BAD 
      static int PLAYREASON_BOTH_NETWORK_BAD 
      static int PLAYREASON_OK 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onPlayerStateUpdate(VodPlayer player, int newState, int reason)
      On player state update.
